english.default: Show me my Lord God, my Love, O Guru; meeting the Lord, my mind is pleased.

english.text: mai har prabh piaaraa das gur mil har man mane |

devanagari.text: मै हरि प्रभु पिआरा दसि गुरु मिलि हरि मनु मंने ॥

english.default: I am just a fool, O Nanak, but the Lord has appointed me to perform His service. ||3||

default.akhar: hy nwnk! (AwK-) hy hrI! mYN mUrK hW, mYƒ Awpxy (nwm ismrn dy) kMm ivc joV ]3]

translation.spanish: A mí, al más tonto, el Señor me ha llamado a Su Servicio, a Su Devoción y a Su Amor. (3)

english.text: hau moorakh kaarai laaeea naanak har kame |3|

devanagari.text: सलोक मः १ ॥

english.default: In ego they come, and in ego they go.
